title: Radar Roundup: Wizard Works x Fairlight Giveaway, Mission Workshop Notch, Ibis Lifetime Warranty, Wolf Tooth Colored Centerlock Rings, eThirteenHelix Race Aluminum Crank, and You Need a New Bike!
content:
Our Radar Roundup compiles products and videos from the ‘net in an easy-to-digest format. Read on below for today’s findings…

Wizard Works X Fairlight NZ Cyclone Relief Prize Draw!!!!!

Win a Fairlight Secan 2.5 Frameset and Wizard Works bags in support of The Hawkes Bay Foundation Cyclone Gabrielle Relief.

One lucky winner will take home a massive prize pack kindly donated by our pals Fairlight, Hope and Kingcage

Prize includes:

  • Fairlight Secan 2.5 frameset – fluro yellow with purple decals – any size
  • Wizard Works Mini Shazam, Lil Presto, Mag-Neato and Keychain in AllBlack
  • Hope headset and seatclamp in purple
  • King cage Iris bottle cages x 2, Many things cages (and straps) x 2

HECK YEAH!

The prize draw will be open for 2 weeks, closing on Tuesday April 11th 2023, with all proceeds going to Hawke’s Bay Foundations special HB Cyclone Relief Fund, to support the region’s unprecedented relief effort after the devastating Cyclone Gabrielle.

Roll on over to Wizard Works to read more!

Mission Workshop Notch Modular Shoulder/Hip Bag $125

You can never have enough bags. Or at least that’s what we tell ourselves and one of the best makers in the USA is Mission Workshop, who just released its latest bad, the Notch. The Notch is a versatile sling that can be worn cross body, as a hip pack, attached to any of our Arkiv® Modular Backpacks or simply dropped into a bag as an everyday organizing pouch, making it ideal for daily carry and travel.

Made from Dimension Polyant X-Pac® fabric and featuring an ultra-thin laser cut waist belt, the Notch is designed for maximum comfort and mobility. When you’re ready to attach it to an Arkiv® pack, the waist belt tucks away neatly, allowing you to fasten it securely using the optional four-piece buckle set for a customized carrying experience.

See more at Mission Workshop.

Ibis Announces Lifetime Warranty

Ibis Cycles now offers a lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects on all rims, wheels, and frames purchased on or after January 1, 2023. This replaces their previous 7-year warranty and reflects their existing policy of honoring warranty claims for defective products regardless of purchase date.

From detailed setup guides to expert-level customer service to small-part support, Ibis aims to provide exceptional customer service and support after the sale so, you have the best possible experience.

The new lifetime warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship for the original owner. It does not cover damages due to driving into your garage door, casing a Rampage sized step-down, or intentional damage. Products purchased in 2022 or earlier will be covered by our previous 7-year warranty.

To activate your lifetime warranty,  register your bike on the Ibis Cycles website.

Wolf Tooth Centerlock Rotor Lockrings

If you want to go deep with your anodized components, Wolf Tooth has ya covered!

Wolf Tooth Centerlock Rotor Lockrings use an Internal Spline to secure a centerlock rotor onto a centerlock hub. It is compatible with 12mm thru-axles and QR. The slim design of this lockring with its internal spline allows it to fit on frames/forks that do not have clearance for the existing Wolf Tooth Centerlock Rotor Lockring – External Spline.

Check out more at Wolf Tooth.

Helix Race Aluminum Crank $279.95

eThirteen’s catalog of solid MTB components just got a bit of a bump with the Helix Race Aluminum Cranks. These cranks are a top-of-the-line alloy crank that brings Enduro strength at a Down Country worthy weight (556g -165mm.)

Extensively weight optimized, almost every visible crank surface is CNC machined for the ultimate dream build tech bling. Available in highly optic black or bronze options, and compatible with Boost or Super Boost chainlines with our e*thirteen Helix Race Direct Mount Flip-Flop Chainrings.

Specs:

  • Forged, CNC Machined AL-6066-T6 arms and 30MM AL 7050-T7 spindle
  • Helix R Direct mount Flip-flop Chainring for compatible for Boost/Super Boost Chainline
  • Self Extracting Bolt System creak-free proven Quick Connect ring interface
  • Extensive CNC machining for lightest weights
  • Molded crank strike boots and thick, clear mylar protective decals
  • Available in 3 sizes: 160mm, 165mm, 170mm (165mm) 556g
  • Offered in two machined and anodized finishes – Bronze or Black

See more at eThirteen.
